alert.note: Alert for Mora; San Miguel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 4:49PM MDT until July 30 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central San Miguel County in northeastern New Mexico... Southeastern Mora County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 530 PM MDT. * At 449 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Trujillo, or 27 miles south of Wagon Mound, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Maes and Trujillo. This includes State Road 104 between Mile Markers 25 and 27, and between Mile Markers 29 and 36. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
